#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
#define LET(x, a)  __typeof(a) x(a)
#define TR(v, it) for(LET(it, v.begin()); it != v.end(); it++)
#define si(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define F first
#define S second
#define PB push_back
#define MP make_pair
#define INF 1000000000
#define MOD 1000000007
#define SET(x,y) memset(x,y,sizeof(x));
#define LL long long int
#define ULL unsigned LL
#define PII pair<int, int>
vector<int> E[100000] ;
bool Active[100000];
double ans;
void dfs(int x, int p, int d)
{
    ans += (1.0)/(d+1);
    if(Active[x])d++;
    TR(E[x],it)
        if(*it != p)
            dfs(*it,x,d);
}

int main() 
{
    int t; si(t); while(t--)
    {
        ans = 0;
        int N; si(N); for(int i=0; i<N;i++){Active[i] = false;E[i].clear();}
        for(int i=0; i<N-1;i++){
            int x,y; si(x); si(y); x--; y--; E[x].PB(y);
            E[y].PB(x);
        }
        int m; si(m); while(m--){int x; si(x); Active[x-1]=true;}
        dfs(0,-1,0);
        printf("%.8lf\n",N - ans);

    }
    return 0;
}
